EmailTemplate.subject: Can You Afford Downtime?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> NEWS | HELICOPTER DOES YOUR FLEET HAVE HONEYWELL AVIONICS? Avionics are a big investment. The Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP) offers full coverage of all your Honeywell Avionics. With over 600 service and repair centers worldwide, HAPP aims to get you back in the air….fast. There is nowhere that you can fly that we don't have you covered.
LEARN MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/helohapp]]>
If you don't have Honeywell avionics, please click <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/NonHONAVNX_ComHelo_HAPP.html]]> here.
